changeSet.author: EdwardLegaspi
changeSet.sql: update ar_customer_account a set credit_category_id=(select b.id from ar_credit_category b where b.code=a.credit_category);
update ar_dunning_plan a set credit_category_id=(select b.id from ar_credit_category b where b.code=a.credit_category);

changeSet.author: EdwardLegaspi
changeSet.sql: UPDATE CAT_COUNTER_TEMPLATE set COUNTER_TYPE='USAGE' WHERE COUNTER_TYPE IS NULL
UPDATE CAT_COUNTER_TEMPLATE set COUNTER_LEVEL='UA' WHERE COUNTER_LEVEL IS NULL

changeSet.author: TyshanShi
changeSet.sql: update crm_custom_field_tmpl set storage_type='SINGLE' where storage_type is null

changeSet.author: anasseh
changeSet.sql: delete from crm_custom_field_inst where code='MediationJob_mappingConf'

INSERT INTO crm_custom_field_inst (id,version,disabled,created,updated,code,description,date_value, double_value,long_value,string_value,provider_id,creator_id,updater_id,access_id,account_id,charge_template_id, offer_template_id,service_template_id,subscription_id,versionable,calendar_id,job_instance_id,trigger_end_period_event,serialized_value) VALUES ( nextval('crm_custom_field_inst_seq'), 1, false, '2015-06-30 10:48:10.751', '2015-06-30 15:06:38.01', 'MediationJob_mappingConf', 'Mapping Conf', NULL, NULL, NULL, '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?> <file-format> <converter name="char" class="com.blackbear.flatworm.converters.CoreConverters" method="convertChar" return-type="java.lang.String"/> <converter name="date" class="com.blackbear.flatworm.converters.CoreConverters" method="convertDate" return-type="java.util.Date"/> <converter name="bigDecimal" class="com.blackbear.flatworm.converters.CoreConverters" method="convertBigDecimal" return-type="java.math.BigDecimal"/> <record name="cdrRecord"> <record-ident> </record-ident> <record-definition> <bean name="cdr" class="org.meveo.admin.parse.csv.CDR"/> <line delimit=";"> <record-element length="0" beanref="cdr.timestamp" type="date"> <conversion-option name="format" value="yyyy-MM-dd''T''HH:mm:ss.SSS''Z''"/> </record-element> <record-element length="0" beanref="cdr.quantity" type="bigDecimal"> </record-element> <record-element length="0" beanref="cdr.access_id" type="char"/> <record-element length="0" beanref="cdr.param1" type="char" /> <record-element length="0" beanref="cdr.param2" type="char" /> <record-element length="0" beanref="cdr.param3" type="char" /> <record-element length="0" beanref="cdr.param4" type="char" /> </line> </record-definition> </record> </file-format>', NULL, 1, 1, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, false, NULL, 3,false, NULL);

changeSet.author: anasseh
changeSet.sql: update crm_custom_field_inst VALUES set string_value = '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="ISO-8859-1"?> <file-format> <converter name="char" class="com.blackbear.flatworm.converters.CoreConverters" method="convertChar" return-type="java.lang.String"/> <converter name="date" class="com.blackbear.flatworm.converters.CoreConverters" method="convertDate" return-type="java.util.Date"/> <converter name="bigDecimal" class="com.blackbear.flatworm.converters.CoreConverters" method="convertBigDecimal" return-type="java.math.BigDecimal"/> <record name="cdrRecord"> <record-ident> </record-ident> <record-definition> <bean name="cdr" class="org.meveo.admin.parse.csv.CDR"/> <line delimit=";"> <record-element length="0" beanref="cdr.timestamp" type="date"> <conversion-option name="format" value="yyyy-MM-dd''T''HH:mm:ss.SSS''Z''"/> </record-element> <record-element length="0" beanref="cdr.quantity" type="bigDecimal"> </record-element> <record-element length="0" beanref="cdr.access_id" type="char"/> <record-element length="0" beanref="cdr.param1" type="char" /> <record-element length="0" beanref="cdr.param2" type="char" /> <record-element length="0" beanref="cdr.param3" type="char" /> <record-element length="0" beanref="cdr.param4" type="char" /> </line> </record-definition> </record> </file-format>' where string_value like '<?xml%' ;

changeSet.author: AndriusKarpavicius
changeSet.sql: update crm_custom_field_tmpl set code='PurgeJob_jobExecHistory_jobName', description='Purge job execution history: job name' where code='JobPurge_jobName'
update crm_custom_field_tmpl set code='PurgeJob_jobExecHistory_nbDays', description='Purge job execution history: older then (in days)' where code='JobPurge_nbDays'
update crm_custom_field_inst set code='PurgeJob_jobExecHistory_jobName', description='Purge job execution history: job name' where code='JobPurge_jobName'
update crm_custom_field_inst set code='PurgeJob_jobExecHistory_nbDays', description='Purge job execution history: older then (in days)' where code='JobPurge_nbDays'
update meveo_job_instance set job_template='PurgeJob' where job_template='JobPurge'

changeSet.author: EdwardLegaspi
changeSet.sql: UPDATE CRM_CUSTOM_FIELD_TMPL SET version=0 WHERE code='CRM_ACCOUNT_TYPE' AND account_type='CUST';
UPDATE CRM_CUSTOM_FIELD_TMPL SET version=0 WHERE code='CRM_ACCOUNT_TYPE' AND account_type='CA';
UPDATE CRM_CUSTOM_FIELD_TMPL SET version=0 WHERE code='CRM_ACCOUNT_TYPE' AND account_type='BA';
UPDATE CRM_CUSTOM_FIELD_TMPL SET version=0 WHERE code='CRM_ACCOUNT_TYPE' AND account_type='UA';
UPDATE CRM_CUSTOM_FIELD_TMPL SET version=0 WHERE code='CRM_ACCOUNT_PARENT' AND account_type='CUST';
UPDATE CRM_CUSTOM_FIELD_TMPL SET version=0 WHERE code='CRM_ACCOUNT_PARENT' AND account_type='CA';
UPDATE CRM_CUSTOM_FIELD_TMPL SET version=0 WHERE code='CRM_ACCOUNT_PARENT' AND account_type='BA';
UPDATE CRM_CUSTOM_FIELD_TMPL SET version=0 WHERE code='CRM_ACCOUNT_PARENT' AND account_type='UA';
